name: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade
title: Lan Yan: Dance Vestments Billow Like Rainbow Jade
in_play_description: When Lan Yan, who has this card equipped, is on the field and your character uses a Normal Attack: Gain 1 stack of Swallow-Wisp Shield. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Lan Yan to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Lan Yan, equip this card.
After Lan Yan equips this card, immediately use Swallow-Wisp Pinion Dance once.
When Lan Yan, who has this card equipped, is on the field and your character uses a Normal Attack: Gain 1 stack of Swallow-Wisp Shield. (Once per Round)
(You must have Lan Yan in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
